016package de.cuioss.uimodel.result;
017
018import static de.cuioss.tools.collect.MoreCollections.isEmpty;
019import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.nullToEmpty;
020import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
021
022import java.io.Serializable;
023import java.util.Optional;
024import java.util.function.Function;
025
026import de.cuioss.tools.logging.CuiLogger;
027import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
028import lombok.Getter;
029import lombok.ToString;
030
031/**
032 * <h2>Generic ResultObject</h2> ResultObject provide Builder which supports a
033 * handy object creation.
034 *
035 * See example implementation for provider:
036 *
037 * <pre>
038 *
039 * public ResultObject&lt;Patient&gt; retrievePatient(final SearchParameter param) {
040 *
041 *     final Builder&lt;Patient&gt; builder = new ResultObject.Builder<>();
042 *     builder.validDefaultResult(new Patient());
043 *
044 *     try {
045 *         builder.result(service.lookupPatient(param)).state(ResultState.VALID);
046 *     } catch (final NoSuchPatientException e) {
047 *         private IDisplayNameProvider&lt;?&gt; detail = new DisplayName("No patient found");
048 *         builder.resultDetail(new ResultDetail(detail, e)).state(ResultState.ERROR);
049 *     }
050 *
051 *     return builder.build();
052 * }
053 * </pre>
054 *
055 * See example implementation for consumer:
056 *
057 * <pre>
058 *
059 * public void buttonClicked() {
060 *
061 *     final ResultObject&lt;Patient&gt; result = service.getPatient();
062 *     if (!result.isValid()) {
063 *         new MessageProducerAccessor().getValue().addGlobalMessage(resolve(content), FacesMessage.SEVERITY_WARN);
064 *     } else {
065 *         this.patient = result.getResult();
066 *     }
067 * }
068 * </pre>
069 *
070 * @param <T> bounded result type, should implement {@link Serializable}
071 *
072 * @author Eugen Fischer
073 */
074@ToString(doNotUseGetters = true)
075@EqualsAndHashCode(doNotUseGetters = true)
076public class ResultObject<T> implements Serializable {
077
078    private static final String STATE_MESSAGE = "state";
079
080    private static final String RESULT_MESSAGE = "result";
081
082    private static final long serialVersionUID = -80595591786771138L;
083
084    private static final String HANDLE_EXCEPTION_FIRST = "ResultObject include error which you must handle first. See";
085
086    private static final String REQUEST_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY = "Result state is [%s], so request result detail is mandatory";
087
088    /**
089     * provide non null result
090     */
091    @SuppressWarnings("squid:S1948") // T should implement {@link Serializable}
092    private final T result;
093
094    /**
095     * Represents the state of result
096     */
097    @Getter
098    private final ResultState state;
099
100    /**
101     * optional additional details
102     */
103    private final ResultDetail resultDetail;
104
105    /**
106     * optional error code
107     */
108    private final Enum<?> errorCode;
109
110    /**
111     * flag remember at least one time access to stateDetail
112     */
113    private boolean resultDetailPrompted = false;
114
115    /**
116     * flag remember at least one time access to errorCode
117     */
118    private boolean errorCodePrompted = false;
119
120    /**
121     * @param result       is mandatory
122     * @param state        {@linkplain ResultState} is mandatory
123     * @param resultDetail is mandatory if state is not
124     *                     {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
125     *
126     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any condition is violated
127     */
128    public ResultObject(final T result, final ResultState state, final ResultDetail resultDetail) {
129        this(result, state, resultDetail, null);
130    }
131
132    /**
133     * @param result       is mandatory
134     * @param state        {@linkplain ResultState} is mandatory
135     * @param resultDetail is mandatory if state is not
136     *                     {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
137     * @param errorCode    optional errorCode for backend calls
138     *
139     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any condition is violated
140     */
141    public ResultObject(final T result, final ResultState state, final ResultDetail resultDetail,
142            final Enum<?> errorCode) {
143
144        this.result = checkArgumentNotNull(result, RESULT_MESSAGE);
145        this.state = checkArgumentNotNull(state, STATE_MESSAGE);
146        this.resultDetail = resultDetail;
147        this.errorCode = errorCode;
148
149        if (!isValid() && null == resultDetail) {
150            throw new IllegalArgumentException(REQUEST_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY.formatted(this.state));
151        }
152    }
153
154    static <T> T checkArgumentNotNull(final T toBeChecked, final String attributeName) {
155        if (null == toBeChecked) {
156            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Attribute with name " + attributeName + " must not be null");
157        }
158        return toBeChecked;
159    }
160
161    /**
162     * Copy constructor. For the result it either maps the existing result using the
163     * given <code>mapper</code> or it uses the <code>validDefault</code>, if the
164     * <code>previousResult</code> is not {@link #isValid()}.
165     *
166     * @param previousResult to be copied
167     * @param mapper         to map previousResult to the outcome type of this
168     *                       method
169     * @param validDefault   to be used if previousResult is not
170     *                       {@link ResultObject#isValid()}
171     * @param <R>            result type
172     */
173    public <R> ResultObject(final ResultObject<R> previousResult, final Function<R, T> mapper, final T validDefault) {
174        if (previousResult.isValid()) {
175            result = mapper.apply(previousResult.result);
176        } else {
177            result = validDefault;
178        }
179        state = previousResult.state;
180        resultDetail = previousResult.resultDetail;
181        errorCode = previousResult.errorCode;
182    }
183
184    /**
185     * @param result is mandatory
186     * @param state  {@linkplain ResultState} is mandatory
187     *
188     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if any condition is violated
189     */
190    public ResultObject(final T result, final ResultState state) {
191        this(result, state, null, null);
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * @param result   is mandatory
196     * @param copyFrom to copy state and detail and error from
197     */
198    public ResultObject(final T result, final ResultObject<?> copyFrom) {
199        this(result, copyFrom.state, copyFrom.resultDetail, copyFrom.errorCode);
200    }
201
202    /**
203     * To be used from extending classes with specific handling of the result.
204     *
205     * @param state
206     * @param resultDetail
207     * @param errorCode
208     */
209    ResultObject(final ResultState state, final ResultDetail resultDetail, final Enum<?> errorCode) {
210
211        result = null;
212
213        this.state = checkArgumentNotNull(state, STATE_MESSAGE);
214
215        if (ResultState.VALID != this.state && null == resultDetail) {
216            throw new IllegalArgumentException(REQUEST_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY.formatted(this.state));
217        }
218
219        // null object for Detail supported here
220        this.resultDetail = resultDetail;
221
222        this.errorCode = errorCode;
223    }
224
225    /**
226     * Checks the state.
227     *
228     * @return true if state == RequestResultState.VALID.
229     */
230    public boolean isValid() {
231        return ResultState.VALID.equals(state);
232    }
233
234    /**
235     * @return typed result object
236     * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if RequestResultObject has state which
237     *                                       must be handled before
238     */
239    public T getResult() {
240        if (ResultState.MUST_BE_HANDLED.contains(state) && !resultDetailPrompted && !errorCodePrompted) {
241            throw new UnsupportedOperationException(HANDLE_EXCEPTION_FIRST, resultDetail.getCause().orElse(null));
242        }
243
244        return result;
245    }
246
247    /**
248     *
249     * @return {@linkplain Optional} containing a {@linkplain ResultDetail} if
250     *         available, {@linkplain Optional#empty()} otherwise
251     */
252    public Optional<ResultDetail> getResultDetail() {
253        resultDetailPrompted = true;
254        return Optional.ofNullable(resultDetail);
255    }
256
257    /**
258     * @return {@linkplain Optional} containing a {@linkplain Enum} as error code if
259     *         available, {@linkplain Optional#empty()} otherwise
260     */
261    @SuppressWarnings("java:S1452") // owolff: currently we allow any enum here
262    public Optional<Enum<?>> getErrorCode() {
263        errorCodePrompted = true;
264        return Optional.ofNullable(errorCode);
265    }
266
267    /**
268     * @param logPrefix to be appended to the log message. no additional space is
269     *                  added between prefix and message.
270     * @param log       the logger
271     */
272    public void logDetail(final String logPrefix, final CuiLogger log) {
273        logDetail(logPrefix, state, resultDetail, log);
274        resultDetailPrompted = true;
275    }
276
277    protected static void logDetail(final String logPrefix, final ResultState state, final ResultDetail detail,
278            final CuiLogger log) {
279        if (null != detail) {
280            final var msg = nullToEmpty(logPrefix) + detail.getDetail();
281            if (null != state) {
282                final var throwable = detail.getCause().orElse(null);
283                switch (state) {
284                case VALID:
285                    log.debug(msg, throwable);
286                    break;
287                case INFO:
288                    log.info(msg, throwable);
289                    break;
290                case WARNING:
291                    log.warn(msg, throwable);
292                    break;
293                case ERROR:
294                    log.error(msg, throwable);
295                    break;
296                }
297            } else {
298                log.debug(msg, detail.getCause());
299            }
300        }
301    }
302
303    /**
304     * Shorthand for checking whether the given requestResultObject contains the
305     * given strategy
306     *
307     * @param errorCode to be checked
308     *
309     * @return an Boolean indicating whether the given requestResultObject contains
310     *         the given strategy
311     */
312    public boolean containsErrorCode(final Enum<?>... errorCode) {
313        if (isEmpty((Object[]) errorCode)) {
314            return false;
315        }
316        for (final Enum<?> aErrorCode : errorCode) {
317            if (aErrorCode == this.errorCode) {
318                return true;
319            }
320        }
321        return false;
322    }
323
324    /**
325     * Builder factory method
326     *
327     * @param <R> the result type
328     *
329     * @return new created typed builder
330     */
331    public static <R> ResultObject.Builder<R> builder() {
332        return new ResultObject.Builder<>();
333    }
334
335    /**
336     * ResultObject Builder
337     *
338     * @param <S> bounded result type
339     */
340    public static class Builder<S> {
341
342        private static final CuiLogger log = new CuiLogger(ResultObject.Builder.class);
343
344        private static final String ALREADY_FAILED = "Already failed: ";
345
346        private static final String THE_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY = "The ResultDetail is mandatory if state is not VALID.";
347
348        private static final String STATE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE = "It make no sense to continue because state is not available!";
349
350        private static final String NO_RESULTS_AVAILABLE = "It make no sense to continue because no results available. Use setResult or setValidDefaultResult as fallback.";
351
352        private S tempResult;
353
354        private S tempValidDefaultResult;
355
356        private ResultState tempState;
357
358        private ResultDetail tempRequestResultDetail;
359
360        private Enum<?> tempErrorCode;
361
362        /**
363         * Valid default result will be automatically used if no result exists
364         *
365         * @param result is mandatory
366         *
367         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
368         */
369        public ResultObject.Builder<S> validDefaultResult(final S result) {
370            tempValidDefaultResult = checkArgumentNotNull(result, RESULT_MESSAGE);
371            return this;
372        }
373
374        /**
375         * @param result is mandatory
376         *
377         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
378         */
379        public ResultObject.Builder<S> result(final S result) {
380            tempResult = checkArgumentNotNull(result, RESULT_MESSAGE);
381            return this;
382        }
383
384        /**
385         * @param state is mandatory
386         *
387         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
388         */
389        public ResultObject.Builder<S> state(final ResultState state) {
390            tempState = checkArgumentNotNull(state, STATE_MESSAGE);
391            return this;
392        }
393
394        /**
395         * @param resultDetail is optional if state is {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
396         *
397         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
398         */
399        public ResultObject.Builder<S> resultDetail(final ResultDetail resultDetail) {
400            logDetail(ALREADY_FAILED, tempState, tempRequestResultDetail, log);
401            tempRequestResultDetail = resultDetail;
402            return this;
403        }
404
405        /**
406         * @param errorCode is optional if state is {@linkplain ResultState#VALID}
407         *
408         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
409         */
410        public ResultObject.Builder<S> errorCode(final Enum<?> errorCode) {
411            tempErrorCode = errorCode;
412            return this;
413        }
414
415        /**
416         * Reuse {@linkplain ResultState} and {@linkplain ResultObject} from previous
417         * {@linkplain ResultObject}
418         *
419         * @param previousResult {@linkplain ResultObject} must not be {@code null}
420         *
421         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject.Builder} in fluent api style
422         */
423        public ResultObject.Builder<S> extractStateAndDetailsAndErrorCodeFrom(final ResultObject<?> previousResult) {
424            requireNonNull(previousResult, "PreviousResult must not be null");
425            return state(previousResult.getState()).resultDetail(previousResult.getResultDetail().orElse(null))
426                    .errorCode(previousResult.getErrorCode().orElse(null));
427        }
428
429        /**
430         * <h4>Preconditions</h4>
431         * <ul>
432         * <li>result or validDefaultResult as fall-back must be available</li>
433         * <li>state must be available</li>
434         * <li>if state is not {@linkplain ResultState#VALID} requestResultDetail must
435         * be available</li>
436         * </ul>
437         *
438         * @return {@linkplain ResultObject} if possible
439         * @throws UnsupportedOperationException if you try to ignore conditions
440         */
441        public ResultObject<S> build() {
442
443            if (null == tempResult && null == tempValidDefaultResult) {
444                throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(NO_RESULTS_AVAILABLE);
445            }
446
447            if (null == tempState) {
448                throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(STATE_IS_NOT_AVAILABLE);
449            }
450
451            if (!ResultState.VALID.equals(tempState) && null == tempRequestResultDetail) {
452                throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(THE_RESULT_DETAIL_IS_MANDATORY);
453            }
454
455            // only fallback available
456            if (null == tempResult) {
457
458                if (ResultState.VALID.equals(tempState)) {
459                    log.debug("Are you really sure you want to use fallback value as result for valid response?");
460                }
461
462                return new ResultObject<>(tempValidDefaultResult, tempState, tempRequestResultDetail, tempErrorCode);
463            }
464
465            return new ResultObject<>(tempResult, tempState, tempRequestResultDetail, tempErrorCode);
466
467        }
468
469        @SuppressWarnings("java:S3655") // owolff: False positive: isPresent is called
470        private void throwUnsupportedOperationExceptionAndSaveThePreviousError(final String errorMsg) {
471            if (null != tempRequestResultDetail && tempRequestResultDetail.getCause().isPresent()) {
472                final var newErrorMsg = errorMsg + "\nThere exits additional error occurs before :";
473                throw new UnsupportedOperationException(newErrorMsg, tempRequestResultDetail.getCause().get());
474            }
475            throw new UnsupportedOperationException(errorMsg);
476        }
477    }
478}
